About

Cyborg Institute

The Cyborg Institute is a collective free software/open source publishing, consulting, and services umbrella. The Institute supports individuals working on projects that address technological issues from a cyborg perspective.

  • Cyborg Institute
  • Projects
  • Contact

tychoish

tychoish is a wiki and blog maintained by tycho garen (Sam Kleinman,) that supports and discusses these projects. See tychoish.com for more up to date information about Cyborg Institute projects and updates.

  • tychoish
  • rhizome (blog)
  • rss feed

Critical Futures

Critical Futures is a sibling project to the Institute focusing on science fiction, publishing, and writing.

  • Critical Futures
  • Projects
  • Contact
